snippet: President Ollanta Humala has tried to sidestep criticism by his own family, but the discord has resonated in part because it echoes growing public dismay over his record.
abstract: President Ollanta Humala of Peru may be unique in that some of his fiercest detractors are his own family, particularly his father, Isaac; Humala's familial discord has resonated in part because it echoes growing public dismay over his record.
lead_paragraph: President Ollanta Humala has tried to sidestep criticism by his own family, but the discord has resonated in part because it echoes growing public dismay over his record.

headline.seo: Peruvian Leader’s Family Discord Becomes Its Own Sideshow
headline.main: He May Be Leader of Peru, but to Outspoken Kin, He’s Just a Disappointment
headline.print_headline: He May Be Leader of Peru, but to Outspoken Kin, He’s Just a Disappointment
